metadata.title: Left Hand C Position
metadata.description: Learn left hand finger placement starting from Middle C

hints.beforeStart: For left hand, the finger numbering is reversed: pinky=5, ring=4, middle=3, index=2, thumb=1. Place your pinky (5) on Middle C for the C position with left hand.

commonMistakes.advice: Left hand fingers are numbered the same way as right hand (1-5 from thumb to pinky), but the hand position is lower on the keyboard. Your pinky (5) goes on C, not your thumb (1).
Left hand sometimes feels more awkward at first. Keep it relaxed and curved just like your right hand. Practice slowly and deliberately.

hints.successMessage: Good! You've placed your left hand on C. Now you'll expand just like you did with the right hand.
